title: [Self-Directed] Cognitive Load Analysis and Strategy Development for Graphic Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and ability to interpret graphical materials
context.additional_context: Adult education program analyzing graphical problem-solving processes and learning cognitive load management strategies in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain problem-solving steps in complex graphical materials in at least three stages
Learners can apply at least two strategies to optimize cognitive load by analyzing interdependencies between problems
Learners can monitor their cognitive load levels in real-time and execute at least three regulation techniques

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
